content: cast on/off tails for seaming in mattress row 26 to 28 starting on a ws purl row work 3 stitch a one stitch seam allowance has been row in stockinette included in the pattern row 29 k2tog 4 times 4 sts marking stitches pull through to cast off use stitch markers or thread a piece of waste yarn through the stitch to be marked as a guide for inserting the eyes when making up making up remove the stitch markers and insert the toy safety knitting pattern eyes sew the side edges of the garlic together adding stuffing as you sew and gather the cast on sts garlic together at the bottom to finish make 1 for the leaf cast on 6 sts in green then cast off all cast on 18 sts in cream yarn on straight 2 75mm sts to make a small strip of knitting sew one end of needles the leaf onto the top of the garlic start at the bottom garlic page 2 of 2 copyright © 2020 amanda berry
